summary: South Vietnam was a country in Southeast Asia that existed from 1955 to 1975. It was created after World War II when Vietnam was divided. The south was supported by the United States and wanted to be independent from communist North Vietnam. There was a lot of fighting, known as the Vietnam War, between South Vietnam, the United States, and the communist forces. In 1975, the north took over the south, and the two parts of Vietnam became one country again as the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.
title: South Vietnam
